path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/LovePot Token Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

findings.title: Owner privileges: Minting of unlimited number of tokens
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to mint an unlimited number of tokens through the 'mint' function.

findings.title: Sending tokens to dead address instead of burning them in token contract
findings.description: In the overridden _transfer function, tokens are sent to a dead address instead of being burned in the token contract.

findings.title: Buying and selling both locked on LOVPTSwapPair
findings.description: Both buying and selling are locked on LOVPTSwapPair contract.
